tool_description: Contacts and verifies volunteer candidate references, conducts structured reference interviews, and compiles reference reports.

candidate_id.description: ID of the candidate whose references to check

position_title.description: Position the candidate is applying for

error_messages: Invalid candidate ID: Candidate ID does not exist in the system.
Invalid reference format: Reference contacts must be in 'name:email:phone' format.
Insufficient references: At least 2 reference contacts must be provided.
Contact failed: Unable to reach one or more references after multiple attempts.
usage: Provide candidate ID, reference contacts in the specified format, and position title. The tool will contact references and compile a comprehensive report.

reference_report_id.description: Unique identifier for the reference report

overall_recommendation.description: Overall recommendation based on all references
